title: Breathing Problems
content: People with breathing issues should avoid intense exercises and eat anti-inflammatory foods.

title: Heart Care Diet
content: Heart patients should reduce salt intake and avoid fried foods.

title: Diabetes Diet
content: Diabetic patients should avoid refined sugars and prefer high-fiber foods.

title: Hypertension Lifestyle
content: People with high blood pressure should limit sodium, avoid excessive caffeine and alcohol, and manage stress with relaxation techniques.

title: Obesity & Weight Management
content: Overweight individuals should focus on calorie control, regular low-impact physical activity, and avoiding sugary drinks and highly processed snacks.

title: Cholesterol Management
content: High cholesterol patients should reduce saturated and trans fats and prefer fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and healthy fats like olive oil.

title: Acid Reflux (GERD)
content: People with acid reflux should avoid large late-night meals, very spicy or fatty foods, and lying down immediately after eating.

title: Kidney Care Diet
content: Patients with kidney issues may need to limit sodium, certain minerals, and processed meats, always following a doctor or dieticianâ€™s plan.

title: General Hydration
content: Unless restricted by a doctor, most adults benefit from regular water intake and limiting sugary beverages and energy drinks.
